block.p: MAJOR LEAGUE BASEBALL

American League YANKEES--Placed RHP Mike Mussina and RHP Carl Pavano on the 15-day DL. Recalled RHP Chris Britton from Scranton/ Wilkes-Barre (IL). TORONTO BLUE JAYS--Placed LHP B.J. Ryan on the 15-day DL. Purchased the contract of RHP Jamie Vermilyea from Syracuse (IL). Transferred LHP Davis Romero from the 15-to the 60-day DL.

National League ATLANTA BRAVES--Suspended INF Willie Aybar three games for violation of team policy. Placed RHP Chad Paronto on the 15-day DL. Optioned LHP Macay McBride to Richmond (IL). Recalled RHP Peter Moylan and LHP Steve Colyer to Richmond. COLORADO ROCKIES--Placed INF Kaz Matsui on the 15-day DL. Recalled INF Clint Barmes from Colorado Springs (PCL). PHILADELPHIA PHILLIES--Activated RHP Freddy Garcia from the 15-day DL. Designated RHP Clay Condrey for assignment.
N.B.A.
TORONTO RAPTORS--Signed F Luke Jackson for the remainder of this season and the 2007-08 season.
N.F.L.

ARIZONA CARDINALS--Signed TE Troy Bienemann and OT Qasim Mitchell to one year contracts. CLEVELAND BROWNS--Signed TE Steve Heiden to a four-year contract extension. INDIANAPOLIS COLTS--Re-signed QB Jim Sorgi.
N.H.L.
LEAGUE--Suspended Nashville F Alexander Radulov one game for hitting San Jose F Steve Bernier from behind in an April 13 game.
COLLEGE
CENTRAL FLORIDA--Announced it is changing its nickname from Golden Knights to Knights. WICHITA STATE--Named Gregg Marshall men's basketball coach. WINTHROP--Named Randy Peele men's basketball coach.
